title: Set up a Team Meeting
description: An editor needs to schedule a meeting with three reporters and a photo editor to plan upcoming coverage.

tasks.description: Check the calendars of all five team members to find a mutually available time slot.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a 30-minute slot where everyone is free.

tasks.description: Send a calendar invitation to all attendees with the meeting time, location (or video call link), and a brief agenda.
tasks.expected_outcome: A meeting invitation is sent to all required personnel.
